## ItemsService.create() method

Creates an object based on a specified request model and saves it to the database. For versioned items, a check-in is performed by default. This operation returns an instance of 'IdentifiableObject' type, as implemented by one of the following:<ul class="model-list"><li><span>ApprovalStatus</span></li><li><span>Bundle</span></li><li><span>BusinessProcessType</span></li><li><span>Category</span></li><li><span>Component</span></li><li><span>ComponentTemplate</span></li><li><span>Folder</span></li><li><span>Group</span></li><li><span>Keyword</span></li><li><span>MultimediaType</span></li><li><span>Page</span></li><li><span>PageTemplate</span></li><li><span>Publication</span></li><li><span>Schema</span></li><li><span>SearchFolder</span></li><li><span>StructureGroup</span></li><li><span>TargetGroup</span></li><li><span>TargetType</span></li><li><span>TemplateBuildingBlock</span></li><li><span>TridionProcessDefinition</span></li><li><span>User</span></li></ul>

**Signature:**

```typescript

        requestModel: IdentifiableObject;
        autoCheckIn?: boolean;
    }): CancelablePromise<IdentifiableObject>;
```
